news.title: Try-Math-A-Lon Pre-PAT Exams Due November 12, 2025
news.content: Teams participating in Try-Math-A-Lon must complete their Pre-PAT exams by November 12, 2025. Visit the ProgmConventions page for direct links to the Lower Division and Upper Division exams. Don't miss this important deadline!

news.title: NSBE 2026 Annual Convention - March 18-22, 2026
news.content: Join over 16,000 attendees in Baltimore for NSBE 2026 National Convention. Registration opens in October! Experience workshops, career fair, networking, and professional development at the Baltimore Convention Center.

news.title: NSBE Region VI Regional Conference - Nov 21-23, 2025
